locale.message: Provide at least one funding source. If your funding source was not included into the list, select "Other", provide all the institution's information.
The name you provided for one of your funding source is already in used by another institution. Please verify if your funding source is not in the list.
The acronym you provided for one of your funding source is already in used by another institution. Please verify if your funding source is not in the list and if not choose another acronym.
Select your primary sponsor. If your primary sponsor was not included into the list, select "Other", provide all the institution's information.
The name you provided for your primary sponsor is already in used by another institution. Please verify if your primary sponsor is not in the list.
The acronym you provided for your primary sponsor is already in used by another institution. Please verify if your primary sponsor is not in the list and if not choose another acronym.
Your secondary sponsor was not in the list and you selected "Other". Provide all the institution's information in order to save it into the database.
The name you provided for one of your secondary sponsor is already in used by another institution. Please verify if your secondary sponsor is not in the list.
The acronym you provided for one of your secondary sponsor is already in used by another institution. Please verify if your secondary sponsor is not in the list and if not choose another acronym.

It seems that one of your funding source is the same as one of your sponsors and provided the information twice. However the names or acronyms do not match (same names but different acronyms or same acronyms but different names).
You provided the same name or the same acronym for multiple funding sources.
You provided the same name or the same acronym for multiple secondary sponsors.

Grant Request
Protocol Amendment
You are about to amend your proposal:

If you do so, you will be able to modify your research proposal and this one will be subject to a new round of review by the committee in charge. Your proposal will enter again the "Submission process". Please follow the instructions displayed on the top of the following webpages. Until the end of the submission steps your proposal will remain in the "Draft" folder.

Supporting Agencies
Identify agencies that provided funding or support for the work presented in this submission.
Refers to geo-spatial location, chronological or historical coverage, and/or characteristics of research sample.
Use the hyperlinked classification system to select classification terms and, if appropriate, numbers.
English=en; French=fr; Spanish=es. Additional codes.
The scientific title and the public title are required. If this portal handle multiple languages, these fields are required in every languages.
The description and the key inlclusion / exclusion criteria are required. If this portal handle multiple languages, these fields are required in every languages.
The protocol version is required.
The therapeutic area is required.
You selected "Other" for you therapeutic area. Please specify
At least one ICD 10 classification code is required. If you know the exact code, specify it in the corresponding area.
Specify if this study is observational or interventional.
At least one primary outcome is required. For each outcome, provide the name, the metric / method of measurement and the timepoint.
Specify the minimum age of the study's participants.
Specify the maximum age of the study's participants.
Specify the sex of the study's participants.
Specify wether or not the study includes healthy volunteers.

Specify if the IDP has been granted CPR.
One of your dur product(s) has been granted CPR. Specify the drug registration number.

One of your trial sites is missing a location. Select a site location in the list. If the site location for one of your clinical trial sites is not listed, select "Other" at the and of the list and provide its information.

For one or more of your trial site(s), you selected "Other" as a location. Provide the name, the address, the city, the geographical area, the DOH licensure number and the Philhealth accreditation number for this site. The list of available sites will then be automatically populated by your information.
There is already a trial site with this name in this city. Please verify that your trial site is not already listed.
There is already a trial site with this DOH licensure number. Please verify that your trial site is not already listed.
There is already a trial site with this Philhealth accreditation number. Please verify that your trial site is not already listed.
Provide the full name of Approving Authority (Director ) for the Trial Site who has issued the endorsement letter..

Provide the primary phone number of the approving authority. Only professional contact details should be provided. Telephone and fax numbers should be entered in this format +Country code, Area Code, Number. Example: +63 44 7911111.
Provide the email address of the approving authority. Only professional contact details should be provided.
Provide the planned number of trial subjects.
For each investigator of each trial site, provide the first name, last name, primary phone number, area of expertise and email.
At least one investigator is required.
The first name, last name, affiliation, phone number, and email address of each investigator is required.

Please select an Ethics Committee.

Please enter the abstract of your research proposal.
Please enter the background of your research proposal. Background: Key issues under investigation, importance, what is known already, and why this study.
Please enter the objectives of your research proposal. Objectives: Key research questions, hypothesis, objectives in bullet points if feasible.

Please enter the study methods of your research proposal. Study Methods: Relevant features of study design (qualitative/quantitative, cross-sectional survey/case-control...), estimated sample size, manner of data collection, etc. [e.g. study involves key informant interviews with policy-makers in Philippines, involving 6-8 people at national or provincial level...]

Please enter the expected outcomes and use of results of your research proposal. Expected outcomes and use of results: Potential outcomes of study such as measurement of prevalence, other indicators being measured, how the results will be used to inform particular policy or program...

Are you sure you wish to continue without uploading a file?

This step allows Supplementary Files to be added to a submission. The files, which can be in any format, might include (a) research instruments, (b) data sets, which comply with the terms of the study's research ethics review, (c) sources that otherwise would be unavailable to reviewers, (d) figures and tables that cannot be integrated into the text itself, or other materials that add to the contribution of the work.
Click Save to upload file.
Are you sure you wish to continue without uploading the supplementary file you have chosen?
No supplementary files have been added to this submission.
Back to Supplementary Files
Are you sure you want to delete this supplementary file?
Upload supplementary file
Add a Supplementary File
Edit a Supplementary File
Supplementary File Metadata
To index this supplementary material, provide the following metadata for the uploaded supplementary file.
Supplementary File
Select file type
Specify "Other" file type
Select file to upload
Creator (or owner) of file
Approval Letter

Proof of clinical trial protocol approval from a level-3 accredited (by Philippine Research Ethics Review Board (PHREB) Research ethics review committee. The list of level-3 research ethics review committees is available at PHREB website at . Please note FDA does NOT require an ethics approval letter from each clinical trial site. However, each institution may opt to have an internal review before issuing the endorsement letter.
Endorsment letter

An institutional endorsement letter from each clinical trial site is required. The endorsement letter should state the agreement from the authorized representative of the clinical trial (e.g. hospital director) for the conduct of clinical trial(s), but also their ability and willingness to monitor the implementation of clinical trial and protection of research subjects.
Informed Consent
The contents of the Informed Consent Form must conform to the highest ethical standards, and should be as approved by level 3 accredited research ethics review committee.
Subject Recruitment Advertisements

Advertising that is intended to be seen or heard by prospective subjects to solicit their participation in a study (e.g. newspaper, radio, TV, bulletin boards, posters, and flyers that are intended for prospective subjects).
Trial related presentations or publications list
If the study has a list of presentations/publications, upload these details in the section. Otherwise, leave it blank.
Investigator's brochure

The Investigatorâ€™s Brochure (IB) should comply with ICH Good Clinical Practice Guideline. It should reflect all available information and evidence that supports the relevance/rationale for the proposed clinical trial and the safe use of the investigational drug product (IDP) in the trial.
Investigational medicinal product dossier

An IMPD should include summaries of information related to the manufacture and control of the IDP, data from non-clinical studies, early clinical trial and human experience data, and overall risk and benefit assessment.
Approved Summary of Product Characteristics
The approved Summary of Product Characteristics (SmPC) is used according to the terms of the marketing authorization.
Label
The label consists of legibly written, printed, or graphic matter on the immediate container of the IDP.
GMP Certificate of manufacturer

GMP certificate(s) issued by the regulatory authority in the country of the manufacturer(s) and should state that the facilities and operations of the manufacturer(s) conform to GMP as recommended by WHO or other equivalent standards.
Letter of delegation from Sponsor

The letter of delegation from sponsor allowing the applicant to conduct the trial is a statement containing the name and address of the CRO, identification of the clinical study, and the obligations delegated
CV of principal investigator

Signed and authenticated CV of all principal investigators at all the clinical trial sites in FDA-required format. Persons engaged in health research involving human participants should be scientifically qualified. The investigator must have the ability and skills to conduct the proposed study and the knowledge of the literature on the subject of interest.
Insurance policy in the event of injury or death
The amount of compensation paid shall be appropriate to the nature, severity and persistence of the injury.

Submission complete. Thank you for submitting your proposal.

If this submission is in a format that is ready to be published without further review, editing, or layout work, it can be placed directly in the last stage of the Editing queue by Clicking here. (Note: Only journal editors have this option for their proposals.)

Investigator File

A user account is required to submit to the Committee. This allows our Secretariat to track your proposals and contact you when the status of your submission changes, or if additional information is required from you.
